definition: variant of 啟蒙|启蒙[qi3 meng2]/to instruct the young
to instruct the young/to initiate/to awake sb from ignorance/to free sb from prejudice or superstition/primer/enlightened/the Enlightenment/Western learning from the late Qing dynasty
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)
to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: Enlightenment education in grade seven is very important.
sentences.chinese: 七年级的启蒙教育非常重要。

sentences.english: One of them would be the eighteenth-century enlightenment.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个就是18世纪的启蒙运动。

sentences.english: Denis Diderot was one of the greatest philosophers and writers in the Age of Enlightenment in France.
sentences.chinese: 狄德罗是法国启蒙时代伟大的思想家和作家。

sentences.english: Junior school English education. Interest and Hobbit building.
sentences.chinese: 少儿英语启蒙教育，兴趣和习惯的建立。

sentences.english: The second chapter is on the evolutionary course of the New Enlightenment Movement.
sentences.chinese: 第二章为新启蒙运动的演变进程。

sentences.english: The second chapter, discusses "New youth" the Enlightenment which starts by the outstanding person culture.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，探讨《新青年》以精英文化发动的启蒙运动。

sentences.english: Enlightenment philosophers did not seek merely to interpret the world but to change it.
sentences.chinese: 启蒙运动的哲学家不仅试图解读世界，还试图改变它。

sentences.english: Wu-Xu thoughts of "save the nation from extinction" and "enlightenment" promoted the trend of "history revolution".
sentences.chinese: 戊戌救亡启蒙思潮催动了“史学革命”潮流。

sentences.english: Li Shutong is an illuminative music educator in modern China.
sentences.chinese: 李叔同是我国近代著名的启蒙音乐教育家。

sentences.english: Rousseau was one of the greatest thinkers of the French Enlightment Movement in the 18th century.
sentences.chinese: 卢梭是十八世纪法国启蒙运动中最伟大的思想家之一。

sentences.english: The first chapter is to initiation tracing combing.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是对启蒙溯源的梳理。

sentences.english: While criticizing and reflecting Enlightenment is the core of critical theory of M.
sentences.chinese: 对启蒙的批判反思，是霍克海默批判理论的核心。

sentences.english: They were inspirational figures, dreamers of beautiful dreams.
sentences.chinese: 因为他们是灵魂的启蒙者，是美好梦想的缔造者。

sentences.english: He introduced me to the Tango .
sentences.chinese: 他是我的探戈舞启蒙老师。

sentences.english: Until the Enlightenment, “thenumber of children you had, it was God who decided.
sentences.chinese: 在启蒙运动之前，“生孩子的数量由上帝决定。

sentences.english: J. J Rousseau was a famous French educational theorist in the Age of Enlightenment. Emel, J.
sentences.chinese: 卢梭是启蒙时期法国著名的教育理论家。

definition: early education (abbr. for 早期教育[zao3 qi1 jiao4 yu4])
Three Character Classic, 13th century reading primer consisting of Confucian tenets in lines of 3 characters
Western learning (intellectual movement in the late Qing)/also called 洋務運動|洋务运动
to teach by words and example (idiom)
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
